products.product_name: Women's adidas Originals NMD_Racer Primeknit Shoes
products.description: Channeling the streamlined look of an '80s racer	 these shoes are updated with modern features. The foot-hugging adidas Primeknit upper offers a soft	 breathable feel. products.product_name: Men's adidas Originals Forest Grove Shoes
products.description: The Forest Grove brings back the look of the adidas Oregon running design from the '80s. A favourite for marathon training	 it had a distinctive look and feel with shock-absorbing cushioning and a web-wrapped midsole. These streetwear shoes echo the original look with a textured nubuck and mesh upper. A web overlay on the midsole adds authentic Oregon style.
